mapper.select: select * from dwdm.dim_district order by nation_id, dist_lvl_1, dist_lvl_2, dist_lvl_3 LIMIT #{contentLimit}::INT offset (#{currentPage}::INT-1)*#{contentLimit}::INT
select nation_id, dist_lvl_1 from dwdm.dim_district group by dist_lvl_1, nation_id order by nation_id, dist_lvl_1;
select nation_id, dist_lvl_1, dist_lvl_2 from dwdm.dim_district group by dist_lvl_2, dist_lvl_1, nation_id order by nation_id, dist_lvl_1, dist_lvl_2;
mapper.insert: insert into dwdm.dim_district (nation_id, dist_lvl_1, dist_lvl_2, dist_lvl_3, rgtr_id, updt_id) values (#{nationId}::INT, #{distLvl1}, #{distLvl2}, #{distLvl3}, #{rgtrId}, #{updtId})
mapper.update: update dwdm.dim_district set nation_id = #{nationId}::INT, dist_lvl_1 = #{distLvl1}, dist_lvl_2 = #{distLvl2}, dist_lvl_3 = #{distLvl3}, updt_dt = now(), updt_id = 'test2' where district_id = #{districtId}::INT
